content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of my apartment in Duisburg, as the potential tenant was interested in renting it.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The negotiation did not result in an agreement. I was unable to offer a rental price lower than 1000 Euro per month, while the potential tenant was looking to rent the apartment for 800 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as a 7. He was respectful and straightforward, but the disagreement on the rental price was the main reason for the negotiation not reaching a successful conclusion.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As the conversation progressed, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point. The negotiation ended without a conclusion due to the difference in rental prices that we were willing to accept.
name: Peter Schmidt
